subject: No instruction manual with my purchased pedals.
description_text:
I purchased my Simsonn pro x about a month ago now off of your Amazon store. The box didnt have and instructions of and kind in the box. So, i went online to your website and seen there was a link to view the instructions, but the link is broken and can't be accessed. So, i was hoping that you could send the instructions to me or give the right working link to the pro x pedals on your website.


thank you for your time.

      Paul

conversations.body_text: Hi PJ Wentline,     Sorry for the oversight regarding the manual. I’ll provide you with the digital version.  https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SIMSONN_Pro_X_Ultra_EN.pdf

Thanks for the fast reply. And thank you for helping me out.

     Pj
________________________________
